text: Ezɨ ia Kraisɨn poroghav ikia, mati ia uan mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar ghorir arazim ini. Ezɨ arazir kam, gumazitam uan dafarimɨn a gamizɨ an otozir pu. Puvatɨ. Krais uabɨ mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar ghorir arazir kam atɨ. Kraisɨn arazir kamɨn e, navir ghurimɨn gavgavir e ikiagharɨghɨzim, anetughavkɨnigha, a gɨn amadagha fɨriaghɨrɨ. Kar guizbangɨra mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorir arazim.
